These are APIs of order.

Order¶

Show Menu¶

GET /api/order/show_menu/

Response¶

 {
   "menu": [
       [
           1,
           "回锅肉",
           25.6,
           false
       ],
       [
           2,
           "红烧肉",
           28,
           true
       ]
   ]
}

Submit Order¶

POST /api/order/submit_order/

Parameters¶

Name

Type

Option

Description

ordered_food

list

required

each item contains food id and amount

Response¶

{
   "order_number": "20191010234539-0000000006"
}

Food¶

ListFood¶

POST /api/order/food/

FoodDetail¶

POST /api/order/food/<food_id>/

Orders¶

ListOrders¶

POST /api/order/orders/

OrderDetail¶

POST /api/order/orders/<order_id>/
